com.bees4honey.vinscanner

Class ScannerFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • com.bees4honey.vinscanner.ScannerFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class ScannerFragment
extends android.app.Fragment
    A Fragment which controls device camera and scanner native library. Fragment captures camera output and pass it to native library to detect VIN codes. ScannerFragment may both work in portrait and landscape orientation. To get returned code from ScannerFragment you need to implement ScannerListener interface and pass implementation to fragment via setListener(ScannerListener) method. If ScannerListener is not set then fragment does nothing with the scanned code. Fragment scans both for 1D and 2D vin codes. For 1D vin codes two separate modes are supported: vertical scanning and horizontal scanning. By default horizontal mode is used. Two switch between modes use setScanVertically(boolean) method.

      • isScanVertically

        public boolean isScanVertically()
        Check if ScannerFragment scans vertically for 1D codes.
        Returns:
        return true if 1D scanner is set for vertical scanning and false otherwise. Default value is false

      • setScanVertically

        public void setScanVertically(boolean scanVertically)
        Set 1D scanner mode
        Parameters:
        scanVertically - true to start scanning process vertically and false otherwise.

        Returns:
